title: Trump calls Mattis ‘the world’s most overrated general’
text:
WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump described former Defense Secretary James Mattis as “the world’s most overrated general” during a Wednesday meeting with congressional leaders to discuss Turkey’s incursion into Syria.

That’s according to a Democrat familiar with the meeting who offered a readout of the contentious gathering on the condition of anonymity.

Trump, according to the person, was presented at one point with a quote from Mattis in which the retired general warned of an Islamic State resurgence if the U.S. does not continue to apply pressure. But Trump responded with the insult, criticizing Mattis for not being “tough enough.”

Trump also said during the meeting that 100 Islamic State prisoners had escaped following the U.S. withdrawal from the region, but he insisted they were the “least dangerous” ones.

Asked whether that was true, current Defense Secretary Mark Esper said he didn’t know.
